thread.title: Lending in focus as Australian inquiry begins

title: Lending in focus as Australian inquiry begins
text:
Lending in focus as Australian inquiry begins 6:53pm IST - 01:39 
A government-backed inquiry into Australia's finance sector says it will start its year-long investigation by scrutinising the selling tactics of banks' most lucrative products - mortgages. Laura Frykberg reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A government-backed inquiry into Australia's finance sector says it will start its year-long investigation by scrutinising the selling tactics of banks' most lucrative products - mortgages. Laura Frykberg reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2sqrruf
